item.title: Compiler issue?
item.dc:creator: @Monoxide Monoxide
item.description:
@Monoxide wrote:

Ok ive recently just edited a portal on my server to make it go to admin zone this is what i have

case 2387: // Admin Portal if(playerRights == 2) teleportToX = 3075; teleportToY = 3436; sendMessage("Welcome to the lair."); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("You are not a admin gtfo!!"); break;

Now when i compile it says the usual success message but i go to my server and it just teles to the same old place.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 03:18:34 AM[/size][hr]wow you guys are such great help…

Read full topic
